titleStmt.title: The fissher-mans tale of the famous actes, life and loue of Cassander a Grecian knight. Written by Francis Sabie.
Fisher-mans tale. Part 1.
titleStmt.author: Sabie, Francis.
Greene, Robert, 1558?-1592. Pandosto.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Richard Iohnes, at the Rose and Crowne, neere S. Andrewes Church in Holburne,

notesStmt.note: The first part of a verse paraphrase of: Greene, Robert. Pandosto.
A second part was published the same year.
Running title reads: A fisher-mans tale.
Also apparently intended to be issued with his: Pans pipe.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
